pageContent: Objectives: There are various treatments forprostate cancer nowadays, including techniques that have been used for manyyears such as surgery and radiotherapy, and newer procedures that are gaining prominence in the Urological field like cryotherapy or HIFU (high intensity focused ultrasound). Rectourethral fistula is a rare complication that demands the urologist a great capacity; it may happen after either existent treatment.

metaData.source:
Current salvage methods for recurrent prostate cancer after failure of primary radiotherapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19583717/
